name: Storm's Harvest
description:
Just like in the arcade! Storm's Harvest brings the spooky fun to your home!

Storm, the pumpkin-picking ghost, has until sunrise to collect his crops.
Pick a high score but don't get picked-off! The beasts are also out to claim their prize!

Wendy the Crow and Riptide the Rockodile want to steal your pumpkins for themselves.
Creepy Crawlers are making a mess of your pumpkin patches.
And those ROTTEN slimes are turning your pumpkins into Pumpkindas.

Beat the beasts and grab your gourds!
